SummonerBoost.sanitizedDescription: Removes all disables and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and lowers the duration of incoming disables by 65% for 3 seconds.
SummonerBoost.description: Removes all disables and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and lowers the duration of incoming disables by 65% for 3 seconds.
SummonerBoost.name: Cleanse
SummonerBoost.sanitizedTooltip: Removes all disables and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and reduces the duration of disables by 65% for the next {{ f1 }} seconds.
SummonerBoost.tooltip: Removes all disables and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and reduces the duration of disables by 65% for the next {{ f1 }} seconds.

SummonerHeal.sanitizedDescription: Restores 90-495 Health (depending on champion level) and Grants 30% Movement Speed for 2 seconds to you and target allied champion. Additionally removes any healing reduction effects that afflict either champion.
SummonerHeal.description: Restores 90-495 Health (depending on champion level) and Grants 30% Movement Speed for 2 seconds to you and target allied champion. Additionally removes any healing reduction effects that afflict either champion.
SummonerHeal.name: Heal
SummonerHeal.sanitizedTooltip: Restores {{ f1 }} Health and grants 30% Movement Speed for 2 seconds to you and targeted champion, then removes any healing reduction effects that afflict either champion. If this spell cannot find a target, it will cast on the most wounded allied champion in range.
SummonerHeal.tooltip:
Restores {{ f1 }} Health and grants 30% Movement Speed for 2 seconds to you and targeted champion, then removes any healing reduction effects that afflict either champion.

If this spell cannot find a target, it will cast on the most wounded allied champion in range.

SummonerRevive.sanitizedDescription: Instantly revives your champion at your team's Summoner Platform and increases their Movement Speed for a short duration.
SummonerRevive.description: Instantly revives your champion at your team's Summoner Platform and increases their Movement Speed for a short duration.
SummonerRevive.name: Revive
SummonerRevive.sanitizedTooltip: Instantly revives your champion at your team's Summoner Platform and grants +{{ f3 }}% Movement Speed that decays over 12 seconds.
SummonerRevive.tooltip: Instantly revives your champion at your team's Summoner Platform and grants +{{ f3 }}% Movement Speed that decays over 12 seconds.

SummonerSmite.sanitizedDescription: Deals 390-1000 true damage (depending on champion level) to target monster or enemy minion.
SummonerSmite.description: Deals 390-1000 true damage (depending on champion level) to target monster or enemy minion.
SummonerSmite.name: Smite
SummonerSmite.sanitizedTooltip: Deals {{ f1 }} true damage to target monster or enemy minion.
SummonerSmite.tooltip: Deals {{ f1 }} true damage to target monster or enemy minion.

SummonerExhaust.sanitizedDescription: Exhausts target enemy champion, reducing their Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 30% for 2.5 seconds and reduces their damage dealt by 50% for the duration.
SummonerExhaust.description: Exhausts target enemy champion, reducing their Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 30% for 2.5 seconds and reduces their damage dealt by 50% for the duration.
SummonerExhaust.name: Exhaust
SummonerExhaust.sanitizedTooltip: Exhausts target enemy champion, reducing their Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 30% for 2.5 seconds and reduces their damage dealt by 50% for the duration.
SummonerExhaust.tooltip: Exhausts target enemy champion, reducing their Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 30% for 2.5 seconds and reduces their damage dealt by 50% for the duration.

SummonerTeleport.sanitizedDescription: After channeling for 3.5 seconds, teleports your champion to target allied minion, turret, or ward.
SummonerTeleport.description: After channeling for 3.5 seconds, teleports your champion to target allied minion, turret, or ward.
SummonerTeleport.name: Teleport
SummonerTeleport.sanitizedTooltip: After channeling for {{ f1 }} seconds, your champion teleports to target turret, minion or ward. Teleporting to an allied turret puts Teleport on a {{ f3 }} second cooldown instead. You may reactivate Teleport to cancel it, placing it on a {{ f3 }} second cooldown.
SummonerTeleport.tooltip:
After channeling for {{ f1 }} seconds, your champion teleports to target turret, minion or ward. Teleporting to an allied turret puts Teleport on a {{ f3 }} second cooldown instead.

You may reactivate Teleport to cancel it, placing it on a {{ f3 }} second cooldown.

SummonerMana.sanitizedDescription: Restores 40% of your champion's maximum Mana. Also restores allies for 40% of their maximum Mana
SummonerMana.description: Restores 40% of your champion's maximum Mana. Also restores allies for 40% of their maximum Mana
SummonerMana.name: Clarity
SummonerMana.sanitizedTooltip: Restores {{ f1 }}% maximum Mana to your Champion and nearby allies.
SummonerMana.tooltip: Restores {{ f1 }}% maximum Mana to your Champion and nearby allies.

SummonerClairvoyance.sanitizedDescription: Reveals a small area of the map for your team for 5 seconds.
SummonerClairvoyance.description: Reveals a small area of the map for your team for 5 seconds.
SummonerClairvoyance.name: Clairvoyance
SummonerClairvoyance.sanitizedTooltip: Reveals a small area of the map for your team for {{ f1 }} seconds.
SummonerClairvoyance.tooltip: Reveals a small area of the map for your team for {{ f1 }} seconds.

SummonerBarrier.sanitizedDescription: Shields your champion for 115-455 (depending on champion level) for 2 seconds.
SummonerBarrier.description: Shields your champion for 115-455 (depending on champion level) for 2 seconds.
SummonerBarrier.name: Barrier
SummonerBarrier.sanitizedTooltip: Temporarily shields {{ f1 }} damage from your champion for 2 seconds.
SummonerBarrier.tooltip: Temporarily shields {{ f1 }} damage from your champion for 2 seconds.

SummonerFlash.sanitizedDescription: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.
SummonerFlash.description: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.
SummonerFlash.name: Flash
SummonerFlash.sanitizedTooltip: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.
SummonerFlash.tooltip: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.

SummonerHaste.sanitizedDescription: Your champion can move through units and has 27% increased Movement Speed for 10 seconds
SummonerHaste.description: Your champion can move through units and has 27% increased Movement Speed for 10 seconds
SummonerHaste.name: Ghost
SummonerHaste.sanitizedTooltip: Your champion can move through units and has {{ f1 }}% increased Movement Speed for 10 seconds.
SummonerHaste.tooltip: Your champion can move through units and has {{ f1 }}% increased Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

SummonerDot.sanitizedDescription: Ignites target enemy champion, dealing 70-410 true damage (depending on champion level) over 5 seconds, grants you vision of the target, and reduces healing effects on them for the duration.
SummonerDot.description: Ignites target enemy champion, dealing 70-410 true damage (depending on champion level) over 5 seconds, grants you vision of the target, and reduces healing effects on them for the duration.
SummonerDot.name: Ignite
SummonerDot.sanitizedTooltip: Ignite deals {{ f1 }} true damage to target enemy champion over 5 seconds, grants you vision of the target and applies Grievous Wounds for the duration. (Grievous Wounds reducing incoming healing effects by 50%. This vision does not reveal stealthed enemies.)
SummonerDot.tooltip:
Ignite deals {{ f1 }} true damage to target enemy champion over 5 seconds, grants you vision of the target and applies Grievous Wounds for the duration.

(Grievous Wounds reducing incoming healing effects by 50%. This vision does not reveal stealthed enemies.)

SummonerOdinGarrison.sanitizedDescription: Allied Turret: Grants massive regeneration for 8 seconds. Enemy Turret: Reduces damage dealt by 80% for 8 seconds.
SummonerOdinGarrison.description: Allied Turret: Grants massive regeneration for 8 seconds. Enemy Turret: Reduces damage dealt by 80% for 8 seconds.
SummonerOdinGarrison.name: Garrison
SummonerOdinGarrison.sanitizedTooltip: Allied Turret: Grants massive regeneration for 8 seconds. Enemy Turret: Reduces damage dealt by 80% for 8 seconds.
SummonerOdinGarrison.tooltip:
Allied Turret: Grants massive regeneration for 8 seconds.

Enemy Turret: Reduces damage dealt by 80% for 8 seconds.
